name: Application Name
empty: You have not created any apps yet!

leave.title: Leave App Team
leave.description: You are about the leave the app team. After leaving the team you will not be able to access it again. Are you sure you would like to leave the {{name}} team?

delete.title: Delete App
delete.description: You are about to delete the app. After deleting the app you will not be able to access it again. Are you sure you would like to delete the {{name}} app?

avatar.title: App Avatar
avatar.description: Click on the avatar to upload a custom one from your files. An avatar is optional but strongly recommended.

transfer.title: Transfer Ownership
transfer.description: The organization owner is the person who has created the organization or the person to whom the organization ownership has been transferred. The Owner has full control over the organization and only organization owners can delete the organization or transfer its ownership to someone else.
transfer.subDesc: Select the organization member with Admin role to transfer ownership
transfer.successDesc: You are no longer the owner of this organization. You can still access it as an admin.
